result:
body
  font-family: -apple-system,system-ui,BlinkMacSystemFont,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",Arial,sans-serif
  margin: 0
  padding: 0
  line-height: 1.5

.layout
  max-width: 760px
  margin: 0 auto
  padding-left: 20px
  padding-right: 20px

.header
  display: flex
  justify-content: space-between
  align-items: center
  margin-bottom: 20px
  height: 80px

.nav__link
  margin-left: 20px

sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
.layout
  header.header
    strong
      g-link(:to="{ name: 'home' }"
        ) {{ $static.metaData.siteName }}
    nav.nav
      span(v-for="m in menu",
        :key="m.title")
        g-link.nav__link(:to="{ name: m.nameroute }"
          ) {{ m.title }}
  slot

  footer
    hr
    p {{ sidebar }} is sidebar,
    p(v-if="showsidebar") Show Sidebar {{ showsidebar }}

</template>

<static-query>
query {
  metaData {
    siteName
  }
}
</static-query>

<script>
/*

*/
export default {
  props: ['sidebar'],
  computed: {
    showsidebar: function() {
      if (this.sidebar==false) {return false}
      return true
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      count: 10,
      menu: [
        { title: 'Home', nameroute: 'home' },
        { title: 'About', nameroute: 'about' },
        { title: 'Contact', nameroute: 'contact' },
        { title: 'Projects', nameroute: 'projects' }
      ]
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style lang="sass">
body
  font-family: -apple-system,system-ui,BlinkMacSystemFont,"Segoe UI",Roboto,"Helvetica Neue",Arial,sans-serif
  margin: 0
  padding: 0
  line-height: 1.5

.layout
  max-width: 760px
  margin: 0 auto
  padding-left: 20px
  padding-right: 20px

.header
  display: flex
  justify-content: space-between
  align-items: center
  margin-bottom: 20px
  height: 80px

.nav__link
  margin-left: 20px

</style>
